member.name: T:NAudio.Wave.AudioFileReader
member.summary: AudioFileReader simplifies opening an audio file in NAudio Simply pass in the filename, and it will attempt to open the file and set up a conversion path that turns into PCM IEEE float. ACM codecs will be used for conversion. It provides a volume property and implements both WaveStream and ISampleProvider, making it possibly the only stage in your audio pipeline necessary for simple playback scenarios

member.name: M:NAudio.Wave.AudioFileReader.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of AudioFileReader

member.name: M:NAudio.Wave.AudioFileReader.CreateReaderStream(System.String)
member.summary: Creates the reader stream, supporting all filetypes in the core NAudio library, and ensuring we are in PCM format

member.name: M:NAudio.Wave.AudioFileReader.Read(System.Single[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads audio from this sample provider

member.name: P:NAudio.Wave.AudioFileReader.Volume
member.summary: Gets or Sets the Volume of this AudioFileReader. 1.0f is full volume

member.name: M:NAudio.Wave.AudioFileReader.SourceToDest(System.Int64)
member.summary: Helper to convert source to dest bytes

member.name: M:NAudio.Wave.AudioFileReader.DestToSource(System.Int64)
member.summary: Helper to convert dest to source bytes

member.name: T:NAudio.Wave.Mp3FileReader
member.summary: Class for reading from MP3 files

member.summary: Opens MP3 from a stream rather than a file Will not dispose of this stream itself
member.param: The incoming stream containing MP3 data

member.summary: Creates an ACM MP3 Frame decompressor. This is the default with NAudio
